sentences.sContent: Hitherto, Budweiser has been at the forefront of the Americanisation of the world, often to the dismay of foreign drinkers of traditional beers who regard a Bud as a glass of water spoiled.
sentences.sContent_eng: Hitherto, Budweiser has been at the forefront of the Americanisation of the world, often to the dismay of foreign drinkers of traditional beers who regard a Bud as a glass of water spoiled.
sentences.sCn: 至今，百威啤酒一直是世界上最具美国特色的龙头产品，但常常令传统的外国品尝者失望，他们认为一杯百威只是一杯被变质的水。

sentences.sContent: There is also a belief that the decision, which was made by Reuters in the US, is further proof of the agency's Americanisation since it was acquired three years ago by Thomson.
sentences.sContent_eng: There is also a belief that the decision, which was made by Reuters in the US, is further proof of the agency's Americanisation since it was acquired three years ago by Thomson.
sentences.sCn: 人们同样有这样的看法：自从被托马斯收购三年来，美国的路透社所做的决议更深地证明了这一机构的美国化。
